detail_desc: Short dress in a crêpe weave with a round neckline and small opening with a button at the back of the neck. Long balloon sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs and decorative flounces front and back that start at the neck and extend down the sleeves. Straight-cut top section with a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt with a wide seam at the hem.
Fully lined, patterned bikini. Top with two rows of flounces at the front and narrow shoulder straps with a small metal decoration at one side. Bottoms with a flounce at the top.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with long sleeves and a ribbed neckline.
Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Fine-knit ankle socks in a cotton blend with wide elastication at the top.
Earrings in metal, plastic and fabric with a small round disc at the top, polished plastic bead and a large, round pendant on the end. Length 8 cm.
Long-sleeved jersey top with a V-neck at the back with a knot detail at the hem.
Short shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
T-shirt in soft, organic cotton jersey with a narrow ribbed trim around the neckline.
Trousers in cotton-blend slub jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist, slightly lower crotch, gently tapered legs, side pockets and ribbed hems. Regular fit.

Rigid clutch bag in marbled plastic with a decorative knob on the top and a magnetic fastener. Narrow, adjustable metal chain shoulder strap. Grosgrain lining with elastication along the short sides. Size 4.5x10x18 cm.

Straight-style shirt in soft pima cotton piqué with a gently tapered waist, button-down collar, French front and open chest pocket. Double-layered yoke at the back, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slim Fit – a fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, small embroidery detail on the chest and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Chinos in cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly, side pockets, a fake back pocket with a button and slim legs.

Fully lined tankini top with a wrapover top section and gently draped front for best fit over the tummy. Padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support, adjustable shoulder straps and concealed elastication under the bust for added support. The polyester content of the top is partly recycled.
Puffer jacket with a detachable, padded hood, high collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Front pockets, covered elastication at the cuffs and narrow elastication at the hem. Lined.

Trainers in mesh with details in imitation leather, a padded edge and tongue, lacing at the front and a decorative lacing detail around the heel. Grosgrain loops front and back. Jersey linings, mesh insoles and chunky soles.
Jumper in a soft rib knit containing some wool with a V-neck, low dropped shoulders and long sleeves.

Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a high waist and wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist. Sculpting seams at the back that showcase the body’s physique. Concealed key pocket in the waistband.
Long, fitted dress in softly draping jersey with a sheen. Straight cut at the top, spaghetti shoulder straps that tie at the back, and a low cut and slit at the back. Lined.
Soft, non-wired microfibre bra with lace details and moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with a wrapover front and press-studs down the sides and at the crotch.
Takeaway mug in plastic with a lid. Capacity 300 ml.
Fitted jumper in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend with a collar, V-neck and long sleeves.
Short dress in a crêpe weave with 3/4-length sleeves with ties at the cuffs, and a straight-cut hem. Unlined.
Small, glow-in-the-dark plastic toy dinosaurs in various sizes and designs. Size approx. 3x5 cm.
Metal hair clips. Length 4 cm.
Cotton jersey briefs in various designs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Sunglasses with concealed frames and angular, UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Crop tops in cotton jersey with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Short, flared dress in woven fabric with hemstitching and narrow adjustable shoulder straps. V-neck at the front and a deep V-neck with lacing at the back. Unlined.
Top in a viscose crêpe weave with short sleeves and a rounded hem.
Calf-length dress in soft jersey with a gently draped collar, V-neck and wrapover front. Long, wide sleeves with wide cuffs and a seam at the waist with ties at one side. Unlined.
Brazilian briefs in lace with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and high cut at the back.
Large scarf in a supersoft weave with long fringes on the short sides.
Pre-tied bow tie in a satin weave with an adjustable strap and fastening at the back. Width 11 cm.
Trousers in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric with a chest pocket, straps with buttons at the front, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Soft jersey lining at the top.
Small handbag in imitation patent leather with a zip at the top and handle with chain sections. Lined. Size 6.5x16x25 cm.
5-pocket joggers in stretch supersoft denim with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly and tapered legs with shaping seams at the knees and ribbed hems.
Fully lined sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with crossover mesh shoulder straps and decorative straps at the back. Elasticated hem. Light support.
Sleeveless wrapover top in a patterned weave with a deep, flounced V-neck front and back, ties at one side and a concealed press-stud at the front.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood with a decorative drawstring, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Jacket in a sturdy cotton weave with a lined hood, stand-up collar and zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front. Handwarmer pockets and flap patch pockets with press-studs. Partly lined.
Yoga socks with elastic straps that cross over the feet and anti-slip protectors on the soles.
Bikini in jersey and lace. Top with narrow shoulder straps and decorative dolphin-shaped pendant. Fully-lined bottoms.

Blouse in an airy cotton weave. Wide neckline with narrow, covered elastication and gathers for added width, 3/4-length, raglan puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs, and a straight-cut hem.
Long-sleeved tops in stretch organic cotton jersey with a wide neckline and gathers at the sides for best fit over the tummy.
Shirt in an airy cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and an open chest pocket. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
Thong briefs in lace and mesh with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and string back.

Short dress in airy, crinkled, patterned chiffon with a rounded collar and button placket. Pin-tucks and frills at the front and long sleeves with frill trims at the shoulders and cuffs. Seam at the waist, a concealed zip in one side and a gently flared, lined skirt.
Joggers in soft cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Jumper knitted in a soft wool blend with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Leggings in sturdy organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Small metal earrings in various designs, some with sparkly stones.
Cropped sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with an integral, lined sports bra that has an elasticated hem. The polyester content of the top is recycled.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric. Slightly looser fit with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long dress in a patterned viscose weave with narrow shoulder straps and a racer back. Narrow detachable tie under the bust. Unlined.
Hat in a soft knit with a decorative pompom on top, ribbed hem and earflaps. Thermal fleece lining.
Trousers in a crêpe weave with elastication at the back of the waist and pleats at the front. Zip fly and button, a low crotch and wide, gently tapered legs.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband with a concealed key pocket. The polyester content of the tights is recycled.
Swim cap with a peak at the front and a flap at the back to protect the back of the neck.

Blouse in woven fabric with an opening and ties at the top, seams at the shoulders and wide sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Seam under the bust with sewn-in ties at the back and a flare to the hem.
V-neck blouse in woven fabric with short raglan sleeves, decorative gathers at the neckline and buttons down the front.
Cropped top in soft jersey with raw, rolled edges.
Cap in wide-wale corduroy with an adjustable fastener at the back. Partly lined.
Long-sleeved tops in soft jersey with a round neck and long sleeves. The cotton content of the tops is organic.
Nursing bras in soft stretch fabric with opening, lined cups, wide elastication under the bust and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back. Seamless.
Short, high-waisted shorts in a patterned viscose weave with pleats at the top, wide elastication at the back of the waist, and side pockets.

Set with a sleeveless top, pair of puff pants and hairband in a cotton weave. Top with a wide flounce at the top and tie-top shoulder straps. Puff pants with elastication and a small frill trim at the waist and hems. Hairband with a decorative knot detail at the front and covered elastication at the back.
Blouse in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Small, gathered stand-up collar, a V-neck opening and concealed buttons at the front and short, wide, raglan sleeves with ties.

Set with a polo shirt and pair of shorts in soft fabric. Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back. Shorts in a cotton blend with covered elastication at the waist, a fake fly with a button, side pockets, fake welt back pockets with a decorative button, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Sleeveless jumpsuit in woven fabric with detachable, adjustable shoulder straps, a silicone trim at the top and a concealed zip with a button at one side. Seam at the waist with a detachable tie belt and long, wide legs. Satin lining at the top.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a round neck, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides.

Ankle-length trousers in twill made from a viscose blend. High waist with elastication at the back and pleats at the front, a zip fly and button, and fake welt back pockets with a button. Wide, tapered legs with creases.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with a washed look. Elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets, a back pocket, and legs with decorative stitching and ribbed hems.
Leggings in a soft cotton and viscose blend with an elasticated waist. One pair with an all-over print.
Short shorts in woven fabric in a relaxed fit with an elasticated waist with a concealed drawstring, side pockets in the side seams, a welt back pocket and a zip and button at the front.
Espadrilles with a braided jute trim around the soles. Fabric linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Shorts in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist.

Set with a shirt and pair of trousers in a soft cotton weave. Short-sleeved shirt with a collar and buttons down the front. Pre-tied bow tie with an elastic strap and adjustable fastener at the back. Lightly brushed trousers with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and side pockets. Detachable, adjustable elastic braces.
